title: Problems Keen 3
content:
Hello together!

Have a question about a map of Keen 3.
I need to collect the yellow key.
But the stone in the water is very small.
I looked at the map-section on this site - there it is taller.

[img]http://img511.imageshack.us/img511/6671/mkeenoh5.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/6963/ykeenmp6.jpg[/img]

Whats wrong here?

Thanks!

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content:
Well, just updated my version.
Works fine now.

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content:
Interesting, I haven't noticed before it's different in different versions, but I haven't played Keen 3 very much either.

And welcome, by the way.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content: Yeah that was fixed, and then there was also another level bug. The school on top of the mountain in the secret level was also inaccessable in 1.0 (unless you used the G+O+D cheat and flew there).

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content: I must have 1.0, because I've noticed that problem too!  There were a lot of level mishaps in Keen 3, weren't there?[img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content:
Hi!

Looks like there are more problems with version 1.0.
Now i patched all my keen-games to the latest versions.
All patches can be found with google.
Unfortunately level-design in keen 3 isn't the best. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Greetz

title: Re: Problems Keen 3
content: The patches can also be found from the thread on the very top of this forum [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]
